verses.verse: I beseech <WG3870> you <WG5209> therefore <WG3767>, brethren <WG80>, by <WG1223> the mercies <WG3628> of God <WG2316>, that ye present <WG3936> your <WG5216> bodies <WG4983> a living <WG2198> sacrifice <WG2378>, holy <WG40>, acceptable <WG2101> unto God <WG2316>, which is your <WG5216> reasonable <WG3050> service <WG2999>.

And <WG2532> be <WG4964> not <WG3361> conformed <WG4964> to this <WG5129> world <WG165>: but <WG235> be ye transformed <WG3339> by the renewing <WG342> of your <WG5216> mind <WG3563>, that <WG1519> ye <WG5209> may prove <WG1381> what <WG5101> is that good <WG18>, and <WG2532> acceptable <WG2101>, and <WG2532> perfect <WG5046>, will <WG2307> of God <WG2316>.

For <WG1063> I say <WG3004>, through <WG1223> the grace <WG5485> given <WG1325> unto me <WG3427>, to every man <WG3956> that is <WG5607> among <WG1722> you <WG5213>, not <WG3361> to think of himself more <WG3844> highly <WG5252> than <WG3739> he ought <WG1163> to think <WG5426>; but <WG235> to think <WG5426> soberly <WG1519> <WG4993>, according as <WG5613> God <WG2316> hath dealt <WG3307> to every man <WG1538> the measure <WG3358> of faith <WG4102>.

For <WG1063> as <WG2509> we have <WG2192> many <WG4183> members <WG3196> in <WG1722> one <WG1520> body <WG4983>, and <WG1161> all <WG3956> members <WG3196> have <WG2192> not <WG3756> the same <WG846> office <WG4234>:
So <WG3779> we <WG2070>, being many <WG4183>, are <WG2070> one <WG1520> body <WG4983> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547>, and <WG1161> every <WG2596> one <WG1520> members <WG3196> one of another <WG240>.

Having <WG2192> then <WG1161> gifts <WG5486> differing <WG1313> according <WG2596> to the grace <WG5485> that is given <WG1325> to us <WG2254>, whether <WG1535> prophecy <WG4394>, let us prophesy according <WG2596> to the proportion <WG356> of faith <WG4102>;
Or <WG1535> ministry <WG1248>, let us wait on <WG1722> our ministering <WG1248>: or <WG1535> he that teacheth <WG1321>, on <WG1722> teaching <WG1319>;

Or <WG1535> he that exhorteth <WG3870>, on <WG1722> exhortation <WG3874>: he that giveth <WG3330>, let him do it with <WG1722> simplicity <WG572>; he that ruleth <WG4291>, with <WG1722> diligence <WG4710>; he that sheweth mercy <WG1653>, with <WG1722> cheerfulness <WG2432>.
Let love <WG26> be without dissimulation <WG505>. Abhor <WG655> that which is evil <WG4190>; cleave <WG2853> to that which is good <WG18>.
Be kindly affectioned <WG5387> one to another <WG1519> <WG240> with brotherly love <WG5360>; in honour <WG5092> preferring <WG4285> one another <WG240>;
Not <WG3361> slothful <WG3636> in business <WG4710>; fervent <WG2204> in spirit <WG4151>; serving <WG1398> the Lord <WG2962>;
Rejoicing <WG5463> in hope <WG1680>; patient <WG5278> in tribulation <WG2347>; continuing instant <WG4342> in prayer <WG4335>;
Distributing <WG2841> to the necessity <WG5532> of saints <WG40>; given <WG1377> to hospitality <WG5381>.
Bless <WG2127> them which persecute <WG1377> you <WG5209>: bless <WG2127>, and <WG2532> curse <WG2672> not <WG3361>.
Rejoice <WG5463> with <WG3326> them that do rejoice <WG5463>, and <WG2532> weep <WG2799> with <WG3326> them that weep <WG2799>.

Be of the same <WG846> mind <WG5426> one toward another <WG1519> <WG240>. Mind <WG5426> not <WG3361> high things <WG5308>, but <WG235> condescend <WG4879> to men of low estate <WG5011>. Be <WG1096> not <WG3361> wise <WG5429> in <WG3844> your own conceits <WG1438>.
Recompense <WG591> to no man <WG3367> evil <WG2556> for <WG473> evil <WG2556>. Provide <WG4306> things honest <WG2570> in the sight <WG1799> of all <WG3956> men <WG444>.
If <WG1487> it be possible <WG1415>, as much as lieth in <WG1537> you <WG5216>, live peaceably <WG1514> with <WG3326> all <WG3956> men <WG444>.

Dearly beloved <WG27>, avenge <WG1556> not <WG3361> yourselves <WG1438>, but <WG235> rather give <WG1325> place <WG5117> unto wrath <WG3709>: for <WG1063> it is written <WG1125>, Vengeance <WG1557> is mine <WG1698>; I <WG1473> will repay <WG467>, saith <WG3004> the Lord <WG2962>.

Therefore <WG3767> if <WG1437> thine <WG4675> enemy <WG2190> hunger <WG3983>, feed <WG5595> him <WG846>; if <WG1437> he thirst <WG1372>, give <WG4222> him <WG846> drink <WG4222>: for <WG1063> in so <WG5124> doing <WG4160> thou shalt heap <WG4987> coals <WG440> of fire <WG4442> on <WG1909> his <WG846> head <WG2776>.
Be <WG3528> not <WG3361> overcome <WG3528> of <WG5259> evil <WG2556>, but <WG235> overcome <WG3528> evil <WG2556> with <WG1722> good <WG18>.
